@Ankhit! See the issue I see the most is people who legitimately dislike NTR but enjoy the detailed art and facial expressions of the characters in NTR stories, which for some reason, do seem to have superior art, at least in my opinion. Of course these types of comments are still annoying as hell since A) There are people who do enjoy NTR and they don't want to see your stupid comments belittling their preferences, and B) This is a hentai site on the internet, the creator isn't going to see your comment and even if they did, they don't care. I personally feel super bad emotionally when I read NTR even though I realize it's fiction, but I would never read those stories and then comment hating on the story, artist, or viewers who enjoy the content... I would just avoid the story (we can blacklist tags on here guys) or I would read it for the art and just feel bad without hating on others, but hey, that's just me.

@ankhit! xD it depends on manga itself, this one is more like a cheating manga that is following endevours of the slutty wife, the worst ntr possible for me is to read a story with a cuck watching the whole sex and masturbates to it, it's instant flacid for me, but it doesn't matter what i say, experts in comment section knows better what fetish im into :x
It's realy great manga, but those black lines are annoying as hell, i wish to see uncensored version of this masterpiece.
